ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: we get the same thing on our server, as i am sure every uber-guild (stupid term) does on their respective servers.  i don t think anyone is quite as large or
ygData.messageBody:
we get the same thing on our server, as i am sure every "uber-guild" (stupid
term) does on their respective servers. i don't think anyone is quite as
large or has quite the attitude that FoH apparently does though. i think
they have 300 or so members, so they can really take over a large portion of
the high level game from other players. we have about 65 members or so, and
we can do dragons and planes at our leisure as well, but we work very well
with the other guilds on the server capable of doing these. i don't believe
that is the case with FoH. i have no first-hand experience but from what i
hear they deserve their rep, but i guess only those who have dealt with them
personally can know.

ok bragging time, we killed Venril Sathir first =b

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> You can't believe how much FOH bashing there is on the Veeshan message
> boards. I just think its funny that people get so upset when
> a group of
> people want to play a game differently they do. I believe a lot of it
> is jealousy, which is very sad.
